completions.nl_description: Recolor all objects of color O that are neighbors of a square object to color Y.
Recolor all objects to color Y.
Move all objects of color other than C, to fill the gaps around objects of color F and recolor them to Y
Recolor all objects of color G to the color of the neighboring object, then move objects of color F to the position of the neighboring object
Move all objects of color Y or R in the direction of their neighboring object of color F.
Recolor all objects of color G to color Y
Recolor all objects to color Y if they intersect the object's row with another color.
Recolor all objects of color G to color Y.
Extend all yellow objects to the maximum size, without overlapping.
Align all objects of color Y to the left, without overlapping.
Recolor all objects of color G to color Y.
Extend all objects of color Y toward the object of color G, without overlapping.
Mirror all the objects of color Y with respect to the object of color C, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color different than C, toward the object of color C, if they are neighbors of it.
Recolor all objects of color G to color Y.
Move all objects of size 3 to the top of their columns, extending each by new object of a fixed color.
Move all objects of color different than C, toward the object of color C, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color F to the left, change color of all objects G to Y, and change color of all objects R to Y.
Recolor all objects of color G to Y, and all objects of color Y to F
Recolor all objects to color Y if they are neighbors of an object of color C.
Recolor all objects that are not already brown (C) to yellow (Y).
Move all objects of color Y one step left, and then recolor them to color Y.
Recolor all objects of color 'G' to color 'Y' if they are of size 3.
Move all objects of size 5 one step down, and then recolor them to color Y.
Recolor the top-left 3x3 subgrid of all objects to color Y
Change the color of objects F, G, R, and Y to colors G, F, Y, and R respectively.
Move all objects of color different than C, toward the object of color C, if they are neighbors of it.
Recolor all objects to color Y
Extend green objects up to covering the preceding row of yellow objects.
Move vertical objects of size 4 to the maximum number of objects until they touch another object, and then recolor them to Y.
Extend all objects of size 1 toward the object of maximum size, without overlapping.
Recolor every object of size 3 to color Y.
Recolor objects of color Y in the input grid to color F, and recolor objects of color F in the input grid to color Y.
Move all objects of size 3 towards the object of color F, then recolor the objects to color F.
Recolor all objects on the perimeter of the entire grid with color Y.
completions.code: (do (rule (vars (this other)) (filter (and (neighbor_of this other) (color_equals (color_of this) G))) (apply (update_color Y))))

completions.nl_description: Move all objects to the nearest vertical line of objects of color F or Y, and recolor them to match the color of the vertical line.
Extend all objects of color F to the neighboring object of color G.
Recolor all diagonal 'Y', 'R' and 'F' end-to-end objects to 'Y'
Recolor all objects of color F to color Y and then move all objects of color Y downwards.
Recolor all objects of size 3 to color Y.
Recolor the last colored section in each column to the color of the section above it, starting from the second last section.
Move all objects of color different than C toward the object of color C, if they are neighbors of it.
Move and recolor all objects to fill adjoining rows at the nearest G, F, C, and R objects.
Move all line shaped objects of three units towards the object C, then color it with color F.
Recolor all objects of color G to color G and all objects of color F to color F, while shifting other colored objects by one position.
Combine all objects of color Y into a single object.
Recolor all objects of size 3 to color Y
Recolor all objects of size 3 to color Y.
Recolor all objects to color Y
Recolor all objects of size 3 to color Y.
Change the color of all objects in the same row or column as any object of color X to match the color of the object of color X.
Recolor all rows of color G to color Y if they are neighbors with rows where color changes before and after cell containing color C.
Move all objects of color different than C, toward the object of color C, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color different than C and G towards the object of color C if they are neighbors, and then recolor them to color Y.
Move all objects of size 3 one step up, and then recolor them to color Y.
Move all objects of color F and R toward the objects of color G and Y respectively, if they are neighbors of each other.
Recolor all objects of size 3 to color Y
Move all blue objects one cell to the position corresponding to the bottommost row, and then color them yellow.
Recolor all objects to color Y
Move all fuchsia objects to the leftmost cell, then recolor all objects to yellow.
Recolor all objects of size 1 to color G.
Move all objects of color F one step to the right, and then change their color to G.
Move all objects with color Y one step up and update their color to F
Recolor all the objects to color Y.
completions.code: (do (rule (vars (this)) (filter) (apply (update_color Y))))

completions.nl_description: Move all objects of size 3 one step to the right, and then recolor them to color F.
Move each block of colored squares of 3x3 size (Y, F, R) to the topmost leftmost available 3x3 grid section
Objects of color Y and size 1 combine into a single larger object of color Y
Recolor all cells, except the ones with color C, to color Y.
Flip the color Y objects towards neighboring objects of color F.
Recolor all objects of color F to color G, and all objects of color G to color F
Move all objects of size 1 towards the object of maximum size, without overlapping. Then recolor all objects of color F to Y.
Move all objects of size 3 toward the object of color C, without overlapping, then re-color them to Y.
Move the objects of color F to object of color G. Move the objects of color Y to object of color R. Recolor the top row to Y.
Recolor the objects to Yellow, Green, Red based on their surroundings.
Extend all groups of size 1 towards objects of size 3, without overlapping.
Recolor all objects of size 3 to the color of the largest contiguous object in the grid.
Recolor the two small identical objects to match the color of the largest object
Recolor all objects to color Y.
Move all objects of color Y toward the closest object of color F if they are neighbors, recolor objects of color F to Y, and recolor objects of color R to Y.
Move all objects of color different than C toward the object of color C, and then recolor them to color Y, if they are neighbors of it.
Recolor all objects to color Y if they are neighboring the object of color F.
Recolor all objects of size 3 to color Y
Move all objects of color F toward the nearest object of color G.
Move all objects of color G to the position of the nearest object of color F and recolor them with color of F
Move all objects of size 3 one step to the right, and then recolor them to color Y.
Move all objects of color F towards the object of the same color, if they are neighbors of it.
Recolor the vertical positions of each cell group of the same color at the left positions to Y, with cells on the same row ensuring the middle cell is F
Recolor all objects of size 3 to color Y
Move all objects of size 3 toward the object of size 6, and then recolor all objects to color Y.
Recolor all objects of color O to color Y
Recolor all objects of size 3 to color Y
Recolor all the objects to color Y.
Recolor all objects of color different than C to color Y
Recolor all objects of color F to color G.
Recolor all objects of color O to color Y.
Recolor all objects of color G to color Y if they are neighbors of objects of color R or F.
Recolor all objects of color F to color G, and then recolor all objects of color Y to color F.
Recolor all objects of colors G, F, or R to Y.
Move all objects of color Y one step up, and then recolor them to color F.
Extend objects of size 3 towards objects of size 9 without overlapping
